name: GPGPU@Univpm
tagline: Code samples repository - GPGPU seminar @ univpm.it
body:
### GPGPU @ Univpm
Code samples and slides for the GPGPU seminar held by Alesiani Marco at Univpm (Polytechnic University of Ancona - [www.univpm.it](http://www.univpm.it/))

How to clone this repository in your system:
```
$ cd some_folder
$ git clone https://github.com/marcodiiga/gp2univpm.git
```

### Support
Having trouble with the repository? Check out the documentation at https://help.github.com/pages or contact the repository author or your course instructor.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
